data.question: What is the title of the research article?
data.answer: 1D-2D-3D Transformation Synthesis of Hierarchical Metal–Organic Framework Adsorbent for Multicomponent Alkane Separation

data.question: Who is the corresponding author with an email address likhong.wee@kuleuven.be?
What is the main focus of the research conducted in the article?
data.answer: The synthesis of a hierarchical MOF (Metal-Organic Framework) for multicomponent alkane separation

data.question: What method was used for the characterization of COK-18's porosity?
What is the space group of the activated COK-18 according to the article?
Did the research article provide a CIF file for the X-ray crystallographic data of COK-18?
Is the adsorption enthalpy of n-hexane on COK-18 below 51 kJ mol-1?
What technique was used to study gas-phase adsorption at zero coverage surface?
What is the lattice parameter 'a' for the activated COK-18?
Was the SEM technique used to observe the morphology changes during the synthesis of COK-18?
What is the partition coefficient between n-hexane and 2,2-dimethylbutane on HKUST-1?
Does the article mention the use of Grand Canonical Monte Carlo (GCMC) simulation?
What is the main advantage of COK-18 over HKUST-1 for alkane separation according to the article?
data.answer: COK-18 has interconnected hierarchical pore system that reduces diffusion limitation and has low adsorption energies for thermodynamically controlled separation.

data.question: Is the adsorption enthalpy of alkanes on COK-18 similar to that on zeolites?
What is the role of mesopores in microporous materials according to the article?
data.answer: Mesopores in microporous materials help in eliminating transport limitations.

data.question: What is the synthesis yield of COK-18 based on Cu?
Did the article demonstrate the transformation of a 2D nonporous CuBTC layered material to a 3D hierarchical COK-18?
What is the BET surface area of COK-18 as mentioned in the article?
Is the entropy driven adsorption selectivity based on size and degree of hydrocarbon branching a new discovery mentioned in the article?
What is the significance of the hierarchical pore architecture of COK-18 in molecular separation?
data.answer: The hierarchical pore architecture of COK-18 allows for maximizing entropy differences while minimizing transport limitation during multicomponent hydrocarbon separation at low temperature.
